data.eml:eml: Denopelopiaamicitia, a new Tanypodinae from Brazil (Diptera, Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dantas, Galileu P. S., Hamada, Neusa, Mendes, Humberto F. (2016): Denopelopiaamicitia, a new Tanypodinae from Brazil (Diptera, Chironomidae). ZooKeys 553: 107-117, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.553.5988, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.553.5988
